Installation

Editor

  1. Installation of the Editor only requires that you download and unpack the zip archive. If you are reading this document then you have already accomplished that task. But you also need an orchestra so please read on...

Sample Orchestra

Mobileer provides a small sample orchestra, essentially an instrument library, for you to learn with. It contains a complete General MIDI instrument set. To save space, most all of the instruments are defined using mathematical synthesis instead of wavetables. Mobileer may also be providing a custom orchestra for you to use.

  1. Download and unzip the Sample Orchestra. Please do not place it inside the release folder for the editor because you might lose the orchestra files when you download a new release of the editor.
  2. When you launch the Editor, you will be asked to find the orchestra project file so remember where you stored it.
